name: Basic Cream Soup Mix Recipe
story: This cream soup mix not only makes fabulous soup, but it's quick to make! Whenever I taste a new cream soup, I go
ingredients: 8 cups powdered milk, (﴾nonfat such as Carnation)﴿
1/2 cup granular beef or chicken bouillon
1-­‐2 lbs. beef cut into ½ inch chunks
2-­‐3 cups potatoes cut into bite sized pieces (not peeled)
steps: home and test the flavors and adapt the new soup flavor to this mix. It is versatile too, as it can also be used for

Combine the dry milk, flour, and bouillon in a large bowl. Cut the butter into small pieces and cut it in until the
mixture resembles cornmeal. Store in an airtight container in refrigerator 6-‐8 months.

Sprinkle 2 T. instant tapioca, 1 tsp. pepper, 1 tsp. salt on top. Add 1 can tomato soup and 1 can water (or more).
Cover and bake for 5 hours at 250°.
*All the ingredients and measurements can be changed depending on what you like.
